subject: Harness Racing
lead_paragraph: The Hambletonian winner Deweycheatumnhowe was voted the 3-year-old colt trotter of the year, and the record-setting earner Somebeachsomewhere was voted the top 3-year-old colt pacer.
snippet: The Hambletonian winner Deweycheatumnhowe was voted the 3-year-old colt trotter of the year, and the record-setting earner Somebeachsomewhere was voted the top 3-year-old colt pacer.
